name: Bolt Cyberpunk - Construct 3 Tech Demo
description:
Controls 

Start - Tap Spacebar
Jump - Tap Spacebar 
Speed Up - HoldSpace bar 

  • This Construct 3 development tech-demo for Retro Platformer Jam 
  • The demo is an infinite runner that has no start or end. 
  • It has a ton of bugs. 
Credits

Music - City Stomper - DOS-88
Menu - Scirra's Music Pack - Epicargp.m4a
